TextBgivesdan.TextBcorrectlygivesom,Shimabara-no-ran島原の乱(1637-1638).PeasantrebellionthatbrokeoutintheovertaxedShimabaradomain(intheprovinceofHizen)andAmakusaIslands天草諸島(intheprovinceofHigo).TherebelsheldoutHaracastle原城inArima有馬thesoutheastpartoftheShimabaraPeninsula島原半島TheywerebesiegedbytheBakufuforabout3monthsbeforebeingdefeated.Couckebacker,whowasopperhoofdatthattime,sailedforArimawiththefluytRijptoassisttheBakufu'stroops.TextBgivesgekrenkt.TextBlacksthisword
